data.comment: The match has started.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 3, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Cleber Bomfim for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Recife PE.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 7, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ceara's Samuel Xavier gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 8, Ceara to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Free kick in a good position for Recife PE!
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Ceara drive forward but Cleber Bomfim is judged offside.
In the minute 13, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 14, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Ceara's half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 16, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Recife PE.
In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Charles. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 17, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 19, Ceara attack but Tiago's header doesn't find the target.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Ceara throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 20, Ceara drive upfield and Fernando Sobral gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 23, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Recife PE.
Sander is booked for the away team.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Recife PE.
Alyson of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 30, In Fortaleza, Lucas Mugni (Recife PE) misses the target with a header.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 34, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luan Polli.
Luan Polli is back on his feet again.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 37, Leo Chu (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Ceara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Ceara throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Leo Chu for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 43, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro blows against Ceara's Cleber Bomfim for offside.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Junior Tavares (Recife PE) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
The second half has started at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 46, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Castelao with Saulo replacing Pedro Naressi.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE are pushing forward but Lucas Mugni's finish is wide of the goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara's Cleber Bomfim breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Saulo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 54, Ceara to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Fortaleza.
Ceara's Charles breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Recife PE's area.
Ceara's Leo Chu is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 57, Ricardinho (Recife PE) has received a yellow card from Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Ceara.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Recife PE.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a second substitution, with Felipe Vizeu replacing Cleber Bomfim.
Vinicius Lima is replacing Leo Chu for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 61, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In Fortaleza, Felipe Silva of Ceara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The away team replace Ricardinho with Ronaldo.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Chico for Recife PE who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Recife PE.
The away team has substituted Chico with Rafael Thyere. Daniel Paulista is thus making his second change.
Ceara pushes forward through Fernando Sobral, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 69, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
At Estadio Castelao, Luan Polli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 71, Fernando Sobral for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Ewerthon with Marcio Araujo. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Recife PE make their fourth substitution with Bruninho replacing Jonathan Gomez.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Ceara.
In Fortaleza Ceara drive forward through Vinicius Lima. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Fortaleza Ceara's Samuel Xavier is caught offside.
In the minute 78, Free kick Ceara.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fourth substitution, with Wescley replacing Charles.
Ricardinho is on a sub for Felipe Silva for Ceara.
In the minute 79, Ceara drives forward and Ricardinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara's Fernando Sobral gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 83, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 87, Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Recife PE throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara's Wescley misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Ceara are coming forward and Ricardinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
The match has come to a close in Fortaleza. The final score is 0-0.
